#include <cmath>
#include <cstdio>
#include <vector>
#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
 
 
int main() 
{
    
    int ar[100],c1,c2,i;
    int n;
    cin>>n;
    c1=0;
    c2=0;
    for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
    {cin>>ar[i];
    if(ar[i]%2==0)
    {c1=c1+1;}
    else
    {c2=c2+1;}
    }
    cout<<abs(c1-c2)<<endl;
    return 0;
}
